name: Hyper Day 3 - Angry Birds (Pixel Art version)
name_original: Hyper Day 3 - Angry Birds (Pixel Art version)
description:
What is this?

Did you ever played Angry Birds...? Yeeeah, we know you did!

This game is now a classic, and we decided to honor it with a "demake". Now you can enjoy the very first level of the very first version of the game, remade from scratch in Unity and with pixel art graphics! Enjoy, and let us know your best score!

Right now, the record is hold by Ricard, with 20.600 pts.

How to play

Really?

Drag and drop, try to break everything... you know the drill.

IMPORTANT: Close the game using Alt+F4

  

Who are we?

> Ricard Juan Pujol <

Berserk-mode-programmer and amazing game developer. There's not an idea too hard to get done. Contact.

> Joel López Romero <

Art producer at the speed of light. Microscopic-accuracy-pixel artist and brilliant conceptist. Contact.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Thanks for playing, and we hope you all have a great weekend!

Ours was hyper!

Also, don't forget to follow the rules so as not to get infected with Covid-19.

Stay home for as long as possible or wear a mask. We will get over this!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
